Beats website



service :

Web Design / Development

started :

11 Apr Feb 2018

completed :

03 Mar 2018

This an online beat store that I built to sell my music. It works with a BeatStars.com API embedded to integrate a music player that is also a shopping cart.

Made with : html, sass, jekyll, bootstrap 4, jQuery



view on browser.
